scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p bin && curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o bin/yt-dlp && chmod a+rx bin/yt-dlp && curl -L https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz | tar -xJ --strip-components=1 -C bin ffmpeg-*-static/ffmpeg ffmpeg-*-static/ffprobe
